message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for a product worth $12,000 to you.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is $12,000 to me, so I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $13,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my original price.  How about $13,500?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $13,200. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
